relation.text: 1792 I was much Mortified my dear Sir & Madam -- at the long Silence & apparent Coldneſs of my Friends but was Still more Concern 'd when I found
will not do abroad . except at Paris , where perhaps that Title wd be now
this Month . if they have not yet Croſs 'd
occur 'd in the Space of as few Months
wrote with Vivacity & impartiality -- by Dr Blagden . I have paſs 'd Nine Weeks
arriv 'd here the day before Yesterday
find Aunt St Leger much as he was last year
Eat Apple Pye & Tea -- his R——l Consort has something the matter with her R——l foot . now
